Package com.brightcove.player.media

Interface Summary
ErrorListener ErrorListener identifies objects that might receive an error from an asynchronous operation.
PlaylistListener PlaylistListener identifies objects that expect to receive a Playlist object from an asynchronous operation.
VideoListener VideoListener identifies objects that expect to receive a Video object from an asynchronous operation.
 

Class Summary
Catalog The Catalog class provides asynchronous methods for retrieving information about videos and playlists from Brightcove's Media API services.
CuePointFields Static class that contains all the relevant names for fields that are provided for CuePoint data by the Media API.
ErrorFields  
HttpService HttpService provides the basic tools to construct URLs properly, and issue HTTP requests, especially those that yield a JSON response.
MediaService Media Service is a Component that provides interaction with Brightcove's Media API by responding to Events that are sent by the given EventEmitter.
PlaylistFields Static class that contains all the relevant names for fields that are provided for Playlist data by the Media API.
SourceFields Static class that contains all the relevant names for fields that are provided for Source (i.e., Rendition) data by the Media API.
VideoFields Static class that contains all the relevant names for fields that are provided for Video data by the Media API.
 

Enum Summary
DeliveryType Defines standard keys for each type of deliverable media asset handled by the SDK.
